column5: Any opinions about this outfitter and White Clay Lake in particular.
Do a search on "Ogoki"...some decent postings

I have fished Whiteclay six times , but have not been there since July of '99. We have been going to another section of the Ogoki River the past three years. Have a friend who has been there every year since 1972 and he is going there again this August. He will catch fish even when others don't, simply because he knows the lake. He stays at the cabins on the east end of the lake.
we have used this outfitter3 times and would highly recomend them very promt service, and great people fished whitclay and did very goodin the first week of july.
